wf_workflow_version.name: Tracy -Test deployment workflow
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

wf_activity.name: Check for update source exists in the instance

sys_variable_value.value: deployment_state=deploy_test_progress^EQ
deployment_state=deploy_test_progress^EQ

activity.display_value: Check for update source exists in the instance
Check for update source exists in the instance

wf_activity.name: Check if Test deployment is success

sys_variable_value.value: deployment_state=deploy_test_success^EQ
deployment_state=deploy_test_success^EQ

activity.display_value: Check if Test deployment is success
Check if Test deployment is success

wf_activity.name: Deploy Update Sets - 1 at a time, monitor sys_progress_worker for commit status

activity.display_value: Deploy Update Sets - 1 at a time, monitor sys_progress_worker for commit status

wf_activity.name: Make sure all Update sets have a clean Preview

activity.display_value: Make sure all Update sets have a clean Preview
Make sure all Update sets have a clean Preview

wf_activity.name: Retreive Update Sets from Dev, monitor Progress worker record

activity.display_value: Retreive Update Sets from Dev, monitor Progress worker record

wf_activity.name: Set deployment as failed-update source missing in Test, create an Incident

activity.display_value: Set deployment as failed-update source missing in Test, create an Incident

sys_variable_value.value: deployment_state=pending_prod_deployment^state=3^work_notes=Test deployment successful^EQ
deployment_state=pending_prod_deployment^state=3^work_notes=Test deployment successful^EQ

wf_activity.name: SOAP- update the related update set in Prod with Test Deployment Status

activity.display_value: SOAP- update the related update set in Prod with Test Deployment Status

wf_activity.name: There are errors in the update set previews, set deployment status to Pending Test Deployment

sys_variable_value.value: deployment_state=pending_test_deployment^deployment_log=Please correct all the preview errors and click on "Deploy to Test" again^EQ
deployment_state=pending_test_deployment^deployment_log=Please correct all the preview errors and click on "Deploy to Test" again^EQ

activity.display_value: There are errors in the update set previews, set deployment status to Pending Test Deployment

wf_activity.name: Wait 3 sec for update to reflect

sys_variable_value.value: 08fcd0830a0a0b2600079f56b1adb9ae
3bf802c20a0a0b52008e2859cd8abcf2
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
3bf802c20a0a0b52008e2859cd8abcf2
08fcd0830a0a0b2600079f56b1adb9ae
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;

activity.display_value: Wait 3 sec for update to reflect

sys_variable_value.value: deployment_stateINdeploy_test_success,deploy_test_failed^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
deployment_stateINdeploy_test_success,deploy_test_failed^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;

wf_activity.name: Wait for Retrieval to complete, BR on sys_progress_worker to trigger event

sys_variable_value.value: tracy_update_sets_retrieved
tracy_update_sets_retrieved

activity.display_value: Wait for Retrieval to complete, BR on sys_progress_worker to trigger event

wf_condition.name: Fired
wf_condition.short_description: The event we were waiting on has been fired

wf_activity.name: Wait for update set to commit event, broadcasted by BR on sys_progress_worker

sys_variable_value.value: tracy_update_set_committed
tracy_update_set_committed

wf_condition.short_description: The event we were waiting on has been fired
